statMods.name: Expired Vitamins
statMods.description: A bottle of vitamins long past their expiration date. Increases the overall stats of your monster by 1%.

statMods.name: Worn Dagger
statMods.description: A rusty, worn-out dagger. It's about to break. Increases your monster's attack by 2%.

statMods.name: Broken Shield
statMods.description: A shield used countless times before in battle, now in shambles. Increases your monster's defense by 2%.

statMods.name: Children's Book
statMods.description: Green Eggs and Ham. Increases your monster's intelligence by 2%.

statMods.name: Old Running Shoes
statMods.description: Ol' Reliable. Increases your monster's speed by 2%.

tokenMods.name: Broken Lucky Coin
tokenMods.description: Increases the tokens you get from mining by 2%.

tokenMods.name: Wooden Pickaxe
tokenMods.description: Increases chances of finding loot by 1%.

statMods.name: Can O' Nutrients
statMods.description: A can filled with healthy nutrients. Increases the overall stats of your monster by 2%.

tokenMods.name: Lucky Rabbit's Foot
tokenMods.description: Increases the tokens you get from mining by 5%.

statMods.name: Growth Milk
statMods.description: Grow your monster to be big and strong. Increases the overall stats of your monster by 4%.

tokenMods.name: Mom's Credit Card
tokenMods.description: Free money. Increases the tokens you get from mining by 8%.
